selected_quotes: A novel surgical technique for #Menieres #Disease is in the latest #OtoJournal.
Endolymphatic duct blockage: a randomized controlled trial of a novel surgical technique for Ménière's disease…

citation.abstract: To compare the effectiveness of the endolymphatic duct blockage (EDB) and the endolymphatic sac decompression (ESD) to control Ménière's disease symptoms and to evaluate their effect on hearing level.
citation.title: Endolymphatic Duct Blockage: A Randomized Controlled Trial of a Novel Surgical Technique for Ménière's Disease Treatment.

facebook.title: Endolymphatic Duct Blockage
facebook.summary:
Do you have Meniere's Disease or suffer from episodic vertigo spells?  In this research study, 96.5% of patients that underwent endolymphatic duct blockage (EDB) surgery had complete control of vertigo spells following surgery! #NoCoTrustedENTcare
